rules.name: commandSeed
rules.description: Permission level required to use /seed
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: creeperBlockDamage
rules.description: Set creeper explosion block damage type, regardless of mobGriefing gamerule
extras: default: uses default explosion
none: no blocks broken
break: all broken blocks are dropped (like tnt)
destroy: broken blocks are sometimes dropped (like default creepers)

rules.name: deathItemsDespawnMinutes
rules.description: How many minutes it takes for a player's items to despawn after death
extras: -1 for infinte, 0 for instant despawn

rules.name: disableBlazeFire
rules.description: Disable fires made from blaze fireballs

rules.name: disableGhastFire
rules.description: Disable random fire from ghast fireballs

rules.name: dispensersCureVillagers
rules.description: Dispensers feed golden apples to zombie villagers with weakness
extras: Note: dispensers curing a villager does not lower the
villager's prices due to gossips being player-specific

rules.name: dispensersDyeMobs
rules.description: Dispensers can dye sheep (and shulkers if dyeableShulkers is enabled)

rules.name: dispensersNameMobs
rules.description: Dispensers use name tags on mobs

rules.name: dispensersRepairGolems
rules.description: Dispensers can repair Iron Golems with iron ingots

rules.name: dispensersUseCauldrons
rules.description: Dispensers use cauldrons
extras: When facing into a cauldron, dispensers can
fill/empty buckets and bottles, remove layers
from banners, and undye leather armor or shulker boxes

rules.name: dragonBlockDamage
rules.description: Set dragon block damage breaking type, regardless of mobGriefing gamerule
extras: default: default block breaking
none: no blocks are broken
break: broken blocks are dropped
destroy: broken blocks are destroyed and not dropped

rules.name: dyeableShulkers
rules.description: Shulkers can be dyed

rules.name: ghastBlockDamage
rules.description: Set ghast explosion block damage type, regardless of mobGriefing gamerule
extras: default: uses default explosion
none: no blocks broken
break: all broken blocks are dropped (like tnt)
destroy: broken blocks are sometimes dropped (like default creepers)

rules.name: infinityMendingStacking
rules.description: Allows infinity and mending to stack on bows

rules.name: maxPlayerXpDrop
rules.description: Maximum amount of xp players drop on death

rules.name: mobsDropNametag
rules.description: Named mobs drop their name tag on death

rules.name: morePaveableBlocks
rules.description: More dirt-like blocks can be made into path blocks (from 1.17)

rules.name: moveableWaterloggedBlocks
rules.description: Waterlogged blocks stay waterlogged when moved with a piston

rules.name: noFeatherFallingTrample
rules.description: Prevents farmland from being trampled if you have feather falling on

rules.name: noRepairCost
rules.description: No additional cost for using an item in an anvil multiple times

rules.name: phantomSpawningTime
rules.description: Amount of ticks before Phantoms start having a chance to spawn

rules.name: protectionStacking
rules.description: Allows all the different protection types to stack on the same piece of armor
extras: Like enchanting from 1.14-1.14.2

rules.name: quickHarvesting
rules.description: Right click crops with a hoe to harvest and replant

rules.name: removableCurses
rules.description: Curses are also removed when using grindstones or repair crafting

rules.name: renewableDragonEgg
rules.description: Dragon eggs will always be placed on the portal after defeating the dragon

rules.name: shaveSnowLayers
rules.description: Snow layers can be shaved, removing one layer when right clicked with a shovel
extras: Works with silk touch as well

rules.name: shulkerCloning
rules.description: 1.17 Shulker cloning
extras: A shulker hitting a shulker with a shulker bullet can make a new shulker
Feature from 20w45a, subject to change

rules.name: shulkerPortalFix
rules.description: Shulker portal teleportation fix
extras: Fixes MC-139265 / MC-168900, which makes shulkers use portals correctly now,
and fixes MC-183884 which makes shulkers able to be next to each other without teleporting
(well, probably at least)

rules.name: slimeLooting
rules.description: Bigger slimes spawn more smaller slimes when killed with looting
extras: Additional slimes can be up to as many levels of looting as you have (up to +3 with looting 3, etc)

rules.name: vexesNerf
rules.description: Vexes will start to die after the evoker that summoned them dies

rules.name: villagersExplodeBeds
rules.description: Villagers cause explosions when trying to use beds in the nether or end, like players
extras: "But why?" Idk, it's just a funny idea I had
